mapper.select: select msgId, empId, status, routeKey, exchange, count, tryTime, createTime, updateTime from vhr.mail_send_log where = #{}
select msgId, empId, status, routeKey, exchange, count, tryTime, createTime, updateTime from vhr.mail_send_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into vhr.mail_send_log(msgId, empId, status, routeKey, exchange, count, tryTime, createTime, updateTime) values (#{msgid}, #{empid}, #{status}, #{routekey}, #{exchange}, #{count}, #{trytime}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime})

insert into vhr.mail_send_log(msgId, empId, status, routeKey, exchange, count, tryTime, createTime, updateTime) values
(#{entity.msgid}, #{entity.empid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.routekey}, #{entity.exchange}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.trytime}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime})

insert into vhr.mail_send_log(msgId, empId, status, routeKey, exchange, count, tryTime, createTime, updateTime) values
(#{entity.msgid}, #{entity.empid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.routekey}, #{entity.exchange}, #{entity.count}, #{entity.trytime}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime})
on duplicate key update msgId = values(msgId) , empId = values(empId) , status = values(status) , routeKey = values(routeKey) , exchange = values(exchange) , count = values(count) , tryTime = values(tryTime) , createTime = values(createTime) , updateTime = values(updateTime)
mapper.update:
update vhr.mail_send_log
msgId = #{msgid},
empId = #{empid},
status = #{status},
routeKey = #{routekey},
exchange = #{exchange},
count = #{count},
tryTime = #{trytime},
createTime = #{createtime},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
where = #{}
